title: Talk That Ship To Me (with Troy Walker)
itunes:title: Talk That Ship To Me (with Troy Walker)
description:
Did slavery not exist because Black people were already in America? Langston and his guest Troy Walker (Jimmy Kimmel Live) navigate this wildly debunk-able conspiracy theory.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
